no-selected-project.message: Select a project to work with

welcome.message: Your account has been successfully created! ðŸŽ‰
welcome.sub-message: Now you can create your first project.
welcome.text-content: Before you start, we recommend watching our short video tutorial: Getting started with Runkod

upload-zone.label: Drag and drop files or folders here to upload

notify-bar.starter-project: Our Starter project helps you to understand how Runkod works. Click here to see instructions.

new-project-dialog.title: New Project
new-project-dialog.error-not-valid-name: Only letters and numbers are allowed
new-project-dialog.error-not-available: Name is not available. Please choose another!
new-project-dialog.error-dns: Please check DNS settings for the domain name. Click the button below to find out current DNS settings. If you have configured please keep in mind that it can take some time for those DNS to take effect across the internet.

example-project-dialog.title: Starter project
example-project-dialog.description: Starter project provides a placeholder website for your project. Please follow the steps below to setup.
example-project-dialog.step1-content: Click here to download Starter project.
example-project-dialog.step2-content: Unzip the file on your computer.
example-project-dialog.step3-content: Drag & drop extracted files to your project.

upload-queue-dialog.conflict-question: Do you want to overwrite it?

project-settings-dialog.title: Settings
project-settings-dialog.delete-description: This action might not be undone. Please be certain.
project-settings-dialog.redirect-description: Redirect this project to one of your other projects.

contact-dialog.title: You can reach us on these channels

dns-info-dialog.title: DNS settings for custom domains
dns-info-dialog.line1: First, go to the DNS settings page of your domain provider.
dns-info-dialog.line2: Then, Create an A record: type @ for "Host" and paste 178.128.141.114 under "Value" or "Points to".
dns-info-dialog.line3: If you want to redirect www subdomain, add CNAME record like above.
dns-info-dialog.line4: Please keep in mind, depending on your DNS provider it may take some time to activate new settings.
